content.rendered:
Digital Progressive Lenses

New to progressive lenses? Tired of boring bifocals?
Not sure which progressive lenses to choose being first time users?

Our Digiviz range of digital freeform progressive lenses are carefully designed to offer maximum unrestricted vision with the same freedom and comfort as before to new progressive users. From simple prescription progressive lenses, to those that offer almost equal vision of near, far and intermediate, to greater vision area of near and far; there is a design to serve your need and put you at complete ease as a fresh progressive lens user.


Progressive Lenses for New Users

If you need to switch to progressive lenses for the very first time, as prescribed by your doctor, Arriv will help you make the transition from single vision or bi-focal lenses to progressives in the best possible way.


Balanced Freeform Progressive Lenses

Minimax raises the bar of digital freeform progressive lenses to the next stage, offering maximum and almost equal vision area of near, intermediate and far. These custom-designed digital


Freeform Progressive Lenses for First Time Users

If you want to make the progression from single vision or bi-focal lenses to progressive lenses, there is no better product than Iris to ease you into it. ..


Digital Progressive Lenses for Optimum Vision Clarity

Maxus takes the level of basic digital freeform progressive lenses even higher with significantly improved vision clarity, sharpness and comfort in all vision…
